spec.description: A reference to a type - either primitive, collection, or named reference

variants.description: UTF-8 text - maps to Rust String
variants.name: String

variants.description: 64-bit signed integer - maps to Rust i64
variants.name: Int

variants.description: 64-bit floating point - maps to Rust f64
variants.name: Float

variants.description: Arbitrary precision decimal - maps to rust_decimal::Decimal
variants.name: Money

variants.description: Raw binary data - maps to Vec<u8>
variants.name: Bytes

variants.description: Key-value collection - maps to HashMap<K, V>
variants.name: Map

variants.description: Reference to another Type intent by name
variants.name: Named
